Description:
Detects the execution of the LOLBIN gpscript, which executes logon or startup scripts configured in Group Policy

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Gpscript Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((command like '% /logon%' or command like '% /startup%') and (process_path like '%\gpscript.exe' and original_file_name = 'gpscript.exe')) and  not parent_command_line = 'c:\windows\system32\svchost.exe -k netsvcs -p -s gpsvc')
